articles.title: Karim Benzema's 13-year contract clause sees Real Madrid stung with payout - The Mirror
articles.description: Real Madrid have to make a payment to Karim Benzema's former club Lyon after the striker won the Ballon d'Or award - 13 years after his move to the Spanish giants
articles.content:
Real Madrid must shell out 1million to French club Lyon due to a clause in Karim Benzema's contract after the striker won his maiden Ballon d'Or crown on Monday evening.
